coded_answer.p: I am glad to know about the news that I have received. It is a dream becamesbecome truedream come true and was really unexpected for me!
I would like to travel onin July because of it is more suitable for me. I think I will really enjoy it if I couldcan stay in a tentstent it. It is going to be a new experience and looks exciting.
About the activities while at the Camp, I would like to enjoydo swimming, not because I am good inat it, just because I am keen on it and the other one is Photography.

As I never did this in whole mymy whole life could you tell me if we have to domake our own meals or I cancan I find everything ready to eat there? If noIf not, what do you sugestsuggest? The same question for clothes and money. How much do I have to getput in my pocket?
I hope has had your questions out of your mind.

Last month, I enjoyed to helphelping at a pop concert in Portugal. Everything werewas new for me. I had to (lyd) tidy up the place where they have to wait untilfor their turn. OtherThe other thing I had to do iswas keep an eye inon the towels, I mean, drieddry towels because as you know that country is too hot, especially for my liking, asand they have to change the clothes and lookslook fresh; don't ask me why.
